aboutPagedesc.h2: No. 1 wood retail store in Egypt
aboutPagedesc.parg1: Since 1986, Along these years of experience, offering the uncompromised quality, wide variety and prompt delivery, earned us the respect and trust of the ever-growing wood customers in Egypt.
aboutPagedesc.parg2: Authorized agent for the well-known brands of the American Veneers. Sole agent for FireBAN, the fire rated particle boards up to 120 minutes , certified by IFC , BM Trada (Exova) Q Mark certification , CCS.Authorized agent for GOOD WOOD (the biggest block board factory in Egypt), and for other many other blockboard factories.Retail store is available for workshops, small factories and our users.
